item.title: Remnant 2 Toolkit
item.description: remnant 2 item tracking, build sharing, item database, and more!

item.title: Created Builds - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: view all of the builds you have created on remnant 2 toolkit.

item.title: Favorited Builds - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: view all of the builds you have favorited on remnant 2 toolkit.

item.title: Item Tracker - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: track all of the items you have collected in remnant 2. import from a save file, csv file, or manually add the items.

item.title: Community Builds - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: search community submitted builds based on specific items, releases, or your own collected items.

item.title: Featured Builds - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: browse through builds from popular content creators and community members, including videos and guides about the builds.

item.title: Boss Tracker - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: keep track of all the world bosses, bosses, and aberrations you have defeated in remnant 2.

item.title: Item Lookup - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: search for detailed information about items in remnant 2. unlike other databases, our item looking includes tags detailing item interactions, corrected item descriptions, and more!

item.title: Build Creation Tool - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: create a build for remnant 2 and share it with the community.

item.title: Build Creation Tool - Remnant2Toolkit
item.description: create a build for remnant 2 and share it with the community.
